name: telegraph
description: Samuel Morse invented the electric telegraph.

name: telephone
description: Alexander Graham Bell patented the telephone.

name: light-bulb
description: Thomas Edison developed the practical incandescent light bulb.

name: television
description: Philo Farnsworth demonstrated the first electronic television.

name: world-wide-web
description: Tim Berners-Lee invented the World Wide Web.

name: google-founded
description: Larry Page and Sergey Brin founded the search engine giant.

name: iphone
description: Apple released the iPhone, revolutionizing smartphones.

name: apple-founded
description: Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak founded Apple in a garage.
